Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.utils

Class PlayerTableSerializer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.utils.PlayerTableSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<PlayerTable>
public class PlayerTableSerializer extends Object implements com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<PlayerTable>
Custom serializer for the PlayerTable class. Used to serialize a PlayerTable object into a JSON representation. Ignores some parameters that are not serializable, such as the placedCard matrix, which is substituted with an int id card matrix and a boolean side matrix, used to rebuild the placedCard matrix once the playerTable is completely deserialized.
